entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
